original_title: 脳科学弁護士 海堂梓 ダウト
overview: The story describes how Kaidou Azusa, a practising lawyer and a special appointment associate professor doing research on the brain's memories, is engaged to defend a woman Fuyukawa Sayaka accused of killing her sculptor husband and found to have two ex-fiances who also died mysteriously.
tagline: Matsushita Nao being a brain science lawyer
title: Noukagaku Bengoshi Kaidou Azusa Doubt
